text:
Dia&Co | NYC, LA, or Remote (US only) | Remote-OK | https://www.dia.com

Dia&Co is the leading personalized styling service for women who wear sizes 14+. Our business meets a profound need, and we are on a mission to democratize fashion — not only by providing easy access to quality clothing, but also by building an inclusive community of women who use fashion to celebrate their bodies.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/dia&co

Here are some of our open positions:

* Director of Engineering: https://www.dia.com/careers/job?gh_jid=711199&gh_src=eshew45...

* Lead Software Engineer, Consumer (frontend heavy): https://www.dia.com/careers/job?gh_jid=1386889&gh_src=eshew4...

* Senior Software Engineer: https://www.dia.com/careers/job?gh_jid=226476&gh_src=eshew45...

* Software Engineer: https://www.dia.com/careers/job?gh_jid=613338&gh_src=eshew45...

* Senior Project Manager: https://www.dia.com/careers/job?gh_jid=1432914&gh_src=eshew4...

Tech Stack: Engineering: Ruby on Rails, React, Node, Postgresql, ElasticSearch Data: Python + Go, Docker, AWS services (e.g. Kinesis, Lambda, ECS, Fargate…)
